name: tegaki-deploy
description: Say goodbye to server management! `tegaki-deploy` is an automated framework to publish a static website on Firebase Hosting directly from a Google Drive folder. It uses Terraform and GitHub Actions to handle everything. No Git, no CLI, no complex CMS needed. Just drag, drop, and deploy.

scripts.deploy:gdrive-sync: npm install --prefix functions/gdrive-sync && npm run deploy --prefix functions/gdrive-sync

author: T.Fujiba
